details.title: Forward scattering radar power budget analysis for ground targets

kwd: forward scattering radar power budget analysis

authors.affiliation: Moscow Inst. of Electron. Technol., Moscow
authors.name: V. Sizov

details.abstract: An accurate approach to power budget analysis for forward scattering radar with application to the detection of ground targets is presented. A modification of the range equation is used, and the results of experimental testing for its confirmation are given.

ieee.title: First experimental results for a WiFi-based passive forward scatter radar
ieee.displayText: T. Martelli, F. Colone, P. Lombardo, "First experimental results for a WiFi-based passive forward scatter radar", Radar Conference (RadarConf) 2016 IEEE, pp. 1-6, 2016, ISSN 2375-5318.
